description: This PHP source file generates a web-based interface for configuring Quality of Service (QoS) settings related to Wi-Fi Multimedia (WMM) and MoCA on a network device. It includes server-side logic to determine current QoS states and client-side JavaScript to initialize the UI and send configuration updates via AJAX.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the checkbox states for QoS settings based on current device configuration.

methods.name: saveQoS
methods.description: Sends updated QoS configuration to the server via AJAX.
